title: Mariah Carey on for the First Time talking all things Christmas! + Bobby Takes Hard Hitting Job Interview Questions from Amy + BIG studio announcement!
itunes:title: Mariah Carey on for the First Time talking all things Christmas! + Bobby Takes Hard Hitting Job Interview Questions from Amy + BIG studio announcement!
description:
Mariah Carey, yes THE Mariah Carey is on the show for the first time ever! We talk about all things Christmas including her classic “All I Want for Christmas Is You”. Amy asks Bobby questions that Billionaire CEOs ask in job interviews…so listen to this and take notes! Bobby shares A BIG studio announcement. Maybe one of the biggest ever to come in our doors!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
